name: gztest
tagline: A distributed testing framework for gazebo.
body:
gztest
======

gztest is a distributed testing framework for gazebo. It features an architecture, that splits the test execution and the gazebo core from each other. The communication is done via JSON-RPC. The software consists of a serverside system plugin, that fetches all the testable features from the running gazebo world. On the clientside however, you have a library that handles the communication with the gazebo core and provides ease-to-use methods for useful test-conditions like "Object A on B?" etc.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
